This `.item()` introduces an additional data transfer and breaks the async execution since the data transfer is by default a synchronization point.

Is there a way to directly convert a 0-dim Tensor into Scalar. Or can we make the `sparseTensor.mul_` accept 0-dim Tensor as its' parameter.
